---
title: "Projects"
---

## Martha's Vineyard Deer

Investigating the potential of a X-linked genetic disorder causing the death of young male deer on Martha's Vineyard. 

## Leptospira Diversity and Abundance in Fishers

Investigating the number of Fishers infected with leptospira as well as the diversity of the leptospira. 

## Spatial and Diet Impacts on the Microbiota of New England Wild Canids

Determining if diet composition alters the microbiome of wild caninds or if spatial differences cause a greater difference.
